pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/kill.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/kill/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install kill```#### Examples```python>>> kill.kill(61024)>>> kill.kill([61076])```errors```python>>> kill.kill(9999999)kill: 999999: No such process>>> kill.kill(1)kill: (1) - Operation not permitted```
